name: A desiccated hand
data: It decreases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It decreases the users charisma impressively.
It has negative armour class for its type (negative in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It decreases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'channel power'.
It decreases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
It decreases the users poison resistance somewhat.
This foul talisman will assist its owner in the channeling of their magical
energies, increasing their magical regeneration during combat.
